alert.note: Alert for George; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 6:35AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN GEORGE AND STONE COUNTIES THROUGH 715 AM CST... At 634 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles west of McHenry, or 12 miles southwest of Wiggins, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wiggins, Perkinston, and McHenry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
